summary: A group of children living on the street leave their gang, prompting retribution from the gang's leader. After one of the children dies, the rest try to come up with the resources to give their friend a proper burial.
cast: Mounïm Kbab|Mustapha Hansali|Hicham Moussoune|Abdelhak Zhayra|Saïd Taghmaoui|Amal Ayouch|Mohamed Majd|Hicham Ibrahimi|Nadia Ould Hajjaj|Abdelkader Lofti|Khalil Essaadi|Abdessamad Tourab Seddam|Ahmed Lahlil|Karim Merzak|Halima Frizi|Khalid Ghanimi|Mohamed Ajmil|Mohamed Ezzanati|Tarik El Hichou|Jalila Boulhimez|Youssef Semane|Mohamed Gourari|Noureddine Jori|Abdel Ali Abrouk|Bouchaïb Anouar|Mustapha Samit|Saïd El Haymer|Chouaïb El Haymer|Ahmed Naim|Meriame Raiss|Ftah Bouchaib|Mohamed Ammor|Hakim Behlalia|Najat M'Jid|Mourad Kamil|Brahim Boukhabrine|Abdelilah Ammor|Mustapha Nassbi|Mustapha Walahyane
title: Ali Zaoua, príncipe de Casablanca
